title: Spicy carrot and parsnip soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '3 cloves garlic, chopped finely', '1 green birdseye chilli, finely chopped', '1 red birdseye chilli, finely chopped', '160g chopped onions (1 large onion)', '2 stock jelly pots (chicken or vegetable)', '1.2L boiling water', '1kg carrots, chopped', '500g parsnips, chopped', 'sea salt and black pepper to taste', 'birdseye chilli flakes to taste']
